custom-sql.sql: SELECT cdtSession.* FROM Schedule_CDTSession cdtSession JOIN Schedule_SessionTeacher sessionTeacher ON cdtSession.sessionId = sessionTeacher.sessionId WHERE cdtSession.start_ > ? AND cdtSession.start_ < ? AND sessionTeacher.teacherId = ?

SELECT cdtSession.* FROM Schedule_CDTSession cdtSession JOIN Schedule_SessionStudent sessionStudent ON cdtSession.sessionId = sessionStudent.sessionId WHERE cdtSession.start_ > ? AND cdtSession.start_ < ? AND sessionStudent.studentId = ?

SELECT cdtSession.* FROM Schedule_CDTSession cdtSession JOIN Schedule_SessionTeacher sessionTeacher ON cdtSession.sessionId = sessionTeacher.sessionId WHERE cdtSession.groupId in ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND sessionTeacher.modificationDate > ? AND sessionTeacher.modificationDate < ?
